Collect 15 Wildkin Feathers from the Hinterlands for Erelas Ambersky in Rut'theran Village.
Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.
Speak with Tinkmaster Overspark in Ironforge.
Learn the purpose of the Stone Watcher of Norgannon, and then interact with the Uldum Pedestal in the Tanaris desert.
Venture to Gnomeregan and kill Mekgineer Thermaplugg. Return to High Tinker Mekkatorque when the task is complete.
Bring Techbot's Memory Core to Tinkmaster Overspark in Ironforge.
If you agree to become a Gnome Engineer, then right-click on the Pledge of Secrecy and speak once more with Tinkmaster Overspark in Ironforge.
Bring 6 Mithril Tubes, an Accurate Scope, and 2 Advanced Target Dummies to Tinkmaster Overspark in Ironforge.
Bring a Prismatic Punch Card to Master Mechanic Castpipe in Ironforge.

Using the Bamboo Cage Key, free the Sprite Darters from the pen in the Grimtotem camp. At least 6 Sprite Darters and Kindal Moonweaver must survive.$B$BYou have 6 minutes before Kindal decides it is time to retreat and you fail the quest.
Speak to Quentin in Thousand Needles.
Kill 12 Grimtotem Naturalists, 10 Grimtotem Raiders, and 6 Grimtotem Shamans before returning to Jer'kai Moonweaver in Feralas.
Take Jer'kai's Signet Ring to High Priestess Tyrande Whisperwind in Darnassus.
Orwin Gizzmick in Camp Mojache wants 12 samples of Gordunni Cobalt.
Bring Nekrum's Medallion to Thadius Grimshade in the Blasted Lands.
Wait until Grimshade performs the ritual of divination.
Speak with Gryphon Master Talonaxe.
Search through Velinde's chest for her journal, then return it along with the key to Thyn'tel Bladeweaver in Darnassus.
Speak with Wharfmaster Dizzywig in Ratchet.
Take the Shrunken Head to Neeru Fireblade in Orgrimmar.

Travel to the Hinterlands, and locate the Wildkin. Kill 10, and use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Wildkin.$B$BBring 10 Wildkin Muiseks and the Muisek Vessel to Witch Doctor Uzer'i in Feralas.
Kill 10 Frayfeather Hippogryphs of any type, then use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture them.
Kill 8 Sprite Darters or Sprite Dragons. Use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Faerie Dragons.
Kill 3 Wandering Forest Walkers. Use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Treants.
Kill 7 Land Walkers or Cliff Giants. Use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Mountain Giants.
Bring 2 Splintered Logs, 6 Encrusted Minerals, 20 pieces of Resilient Sinew, and 40 Metallic Fragments to Witch Doctor Uzer'i in Camp Mojache.
Witch Doctor Uzer'i wants you to wait for a moment while he prepares the weapons.
Find Marvon Rivetseeker in Tanaris.

Dirge Quikcleave wants you to get the following items:$B$B12 Giant Eggs. You will find those on the Rocs wandering Tanaris or any other species of large bird.$B$B10 pieces of Zesty Clam Meat. You can find those in clams, naturally!$B$B20 pieces of Alterac Swiss. Get thee to a cheesery!$B$BGather all of the items and return to Dirge.
Recover Lakmaeran's Carcass and 20 Chimaerok Tenderloins for Dirge Quikcleave in Tanaris.
Dirge Quikcleave in Gadgetzan wants you to bring him 20 Goblin Rocket Fuel and 20 Deeprock Salt.
Deliver the 500 Pound Chicken to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.
If you agree to become a Goblin Engineer, then right-click on the Pledge of Secrecy and speak once more with Nixx Sprocketspring in Gadgetzan.
Bring 20 Big Iron Bombs, 20 Solid Dynamite, and 5 Explosive Sheep to Nixx Sprocketspring in Gadgetzan.
Speak with Torwa Pathfinder in Un'Goro Crater.
Take the Proof of Deed back to Mountaineer Pebblebitty.
Return to the Searing Gorge and find Dorius's archaeology unit.
Help Dorius get back to Ironforge.$B
Bring Ahanu's Leather Goods to Tal in Thunder Bluff.
Deliver Xylem's Note to Jediga in Azshara.
Bring 10 Encoded Fragments to Archmage Xylem in Azshara.
Return the Azure Key to Lord Jorach Ravenholdt.
Bring 10 Glittering Dust to Archmage Xylem.
Collect 6 Enchanted Coral and return them to Archmage Xylem.
Retrieve the Arcane Shard from Morphaz and return to Archmage Xylem.
Retrieve the Prismatic Shell for Archmage Xylem.  The Archmage resides in a tower atop the cliffs of Azshara.
Polymorph the Spitelash of Azshara and kill the clones that appear several seconds later.  When you have slain 50 Polymorph Clones, return to Archmage Xylem in Azshara.
Defend Captain Vanessa Beltis, her crew and the Horizon Scout's passengers against the naga attack. Captain Vanessa Beltis must survive.
Fill all 4 Empty Vials at the tide pools along the coast of the Ruins of Eldarath in Azshara before returning to Chemist Cuely.
Give Cuely's Elixir to Thersa Windsong in Undercity.
Return Tymor's Drawing Kit to him in Ironforge.
Return to Janice Felstone in Western Plaguelands her Good Luck Half-Charm.
Bring a pair of Perfect Courser Antlers to Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast of the Ruins of Eldarath.
Bring 6 Wavethrasher Scales to Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.
Bring the Tooth of Morphaz to Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.
Acquire 4 Healthy Courser Glands and bring them to Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.
Acquire an Ichor of Undeath for Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.
Kill Morphaz in the sunken temple of Atal'Hakkar, and return his blood to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.  The entrance to the sunken temple can be found in the Swamp of Sorrows.
Bring Felix's Box, Felix's Chest and Felix's Bucket of Bolts to Felix Whindlebolt in Anvilmar.
Find the Mysterious Artifact being guarded by the Twilight's Hammer Idolaters in the northwest quadrant of the Searing Gorge and bring it to the Altar of Suntara in the Slag Pit.$B
Slay Lathoric the Black and Obsidion, and return to Thorius in Ironforge with the Head of Lathoric the Black and the Heart of Obsidion.
Bring the Nightmare Shard to Hamuul Runetotem on Elder Rise.
Bring the Nightmare Shard to Mathrengyl Bearwalker in Darnassus.
Search the Thalassian Base Camp for Kim'jael's Compass, Scope, Stuffed Chicken and Wizzlegoober, then return them to him in Azshara.
Find Some Rune that the naga have in their possession in the Ruins of Eldarath and return it to Kim'jael in Azshara.
Hear Zamael tell his tale.
Find the Prayer to Elune and take it to Astarii Starseeker in Darnassus.$B

Kill the group of Shadow Silk Poachers that wander the Searing Gorge. Nilith has reason to believe that there are five of them that need to be exterminated. Return to Nilith in the Searing Gorge when this task is complete.$B
Slay Trade Master Kovic and his minion Clunk. Retrieve the Trader's Satchel from his corpse and return it to Nilith.$B
Speak with Vizzklick in Gadgetzan.$B
Listen as Kalaran Windblade tells his story.
Collect 4 Hearts of Flame and 4 globes of Golem Oil and return the items to Kalaran Windblade.
Bring 8 Thorium Plated Daggers to Kalaran Windblade.
Find and return a Symbol of Ragnaros to Kalaran Windblade.
Wait for Kalaran Windblade to complete the Torch of Retribution.$B
Take the Torch of Retribution.
Speak with Squire Maltrake.
Deliver the Unloaded Zapper and 5 samples of Atal'ai Haze to Larion in Marshal's Refuge.
Collect 9 samples of Un'Goro Ash from the fire elementals around the volcano in Un'Goro Crater, and return them to Liv Rizzlefix in Ratchet.

Using the Drawing Kit, make rubbings of the Rune of Beth'Amara, the Rune of Jin'yael, the Rune of Markri, and the Rune of Sael'hai before heading to the small island off of the southern peninsula of Azshara and signaling Pilot Xiggs Fuselighter to pick them up.
Speak to Xiggs Fuselighter in Ironforge.
Set the North, South, East, and West Sentry Towers on fire by using the Torch of Retribution inside each of the buildings. $B
If you agree to aid Belnistrasz, speak with him again and hand the Oathstone he gave you back to him.
Escort Belnistrasz to the Quilboar's idol in Razorfen Downs.$B$BProtect Belnistrasz while he performs the ritual to shut down the idol.
Speak to Xiggs Fuselighter and get a Standard Issue Flare Gun from him in Ironforge.

Kill 10 Blood Elf Reclaimers, and 10 Blood Elf Surveyors before seeking out Magus Rimtori's camp. Once you've found it, look for something that might be important to her that can be used to draw her into a fight.
Speak to Belgrom Rockmaul in Orgrimmar.
Capture the spirits of 3 screechers in Feralas, then return to Yeh'kinya in Steamwheedle Port.
Bring the First and Second Mosh'aru Tablets to Yeh'kinya in Tanaris.
Bring the Filled Egg of Hakkar to Yeh'kinya in Tanaris.
Bring the Ancient Egg to Yeh'kinya in Tanaris.
Kill the leader of the Talon Den, Rynthariel the Keymaster.

Open the Bundle of Reports.  Take the Warsong Reports to the Warsong Scout, Warsong Runner, and Warsong Outrider. Bring back the updates they give you to Kadrak at the northern watch tower in the barrens.
Collect 7 Hyacinth Mushrooms, 4 Moonpetal Lilies, and 1 Webwood Ichor for Dirania Silveshine in Shadowglen.
Bring Iverron's Antidote to Iverron before the time limit is up. Iverron can be found by the cave to the north.
Find Iverron by the cave to the north.
Speak to Dirania Silvershine in Shadowglen.
Find the Tablet of Beth'Amara, the Tablet of Jin'yael, the Tablet of Markri, and the Tablet of Sael'hai before returning to Jediga in Azshara.
Bring the Tablet of Beth'Amara to Magatha in Thunder Bluff.
Bring the Tablet of Jin'yael to Jes'rimon in Orgrimmar.
Bring the Tablet of Markri to Andron Gant in Undercity.
Bring the Tablet of Sael'hai to Archmage Xylem in Azshara.
Deliver Jes'rimon's Note to Jediga in Azshara.
Bring 8 White Ravasaur Claws to Jes'rimon in Orgrimmar.
Take Linken's Sword to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.
Find J.D. Collie in the cave at Marshal's Refuge.
Travel to Fire Plume Ridge, south of Marshal's Refuge.$B$BFind Blazerunner and use the totem to remove his protective aura. Once he has been defeated, acquire the Golden Flame from the cave.
Venture to the Ruins of Thaurissan in the Burning Steppes and recover information from the Thaurissan Relics. Return to Royal Historian Archesonus when you have recovered the information.
Listen to Royal Historian Archesonus recant the history of Thaurissan.
Speak with Franclorn Forgewright if you are interested in obtaining a key to the city major.
Slay Fineous Darkvire and recover the great hammer, Ironfel. Take Ironfel to the Shrine of Thaurissan and place it on the statue of Franclorn Forgewright.
Return to Thrall!$B
Return to Ironforge and speak with King Magni Bronzebeard.
Find Hilary's Necklace, and return it to Hilary in Lakeshire.
Gershala Nightwhisper in Auberdine wants 8 Corrupt Brain stems.
Defend Gor'shak.

Speak with Kharan Mighthammer and gather information about Princess Moira Bronzebeard's kidnapping. Take that information to Thrall in Orgrimmar.$B$BYou recall Gor'shak mentioning that Kharan is being held in a cell nearby.$B
Listen as Kharan Mighthammer tells his story.
Return to Ironforge and deliver the bad news to King Magni Bronzebeard.
Give Marshal Maxwell the bad news.
Return Marshal Windsor's Lost Information.$B$BMarshal Windsor believes that the information is being held by Golem Lord Argelmach and General Angerforge.
Help Marshal Windsor get his gear back and free his friends. Return to Marshal Maxwell if you succeed.
Travel to Blackrock Depths and slay General Angerforge! Return to Warlord Goretooth when the task is complete.
Speak with Eitrigg in Orgrimmar. When you have discussed matters with Eitrigg, seek council from Thrall.$B$BYou recall having seen Eitrigg in Thrall's chamber.
Bring the Lost Thunderbrew Recipe to Vivian Lagrave in Kargath.
Bring the Darkstone Tablet to Shadow Mage Vivian Lagrave in Kargath.

Travel to Blackrock Depths and recover 10 Essence of the Elements. Your first inclination is to search the golems and golem makers. You remember Vivian Lagrave also muttering something about elementals.$B

Venture to the Burning Steppes and recover 10 Fractured Elemental Shards for Hierophant Theodora Mulvadania.$B$BYou recall Theodora mentioning the golems and elementals of that region as being a source for these shards.
Take the Elemental Shard Sample to Lotwil Veriatus.$B$BYou recall Theodora saying that Lotwil was stationed in a camp to the east.$B

Travel to the Burning Steppes and find Grark Lorkrub. You recall Lexlort mentioning that he was last seen in a massive Blackrock fortress.$B$BWhen you find Grark Lorkrub, use the Thorium Shackles to bind him and then lead him back through Blackrock Mountain to the Searing Gorge. Lexlort will have his men waiting on the other side to take Grark into custody.$B
Travel to Blackrock Spire and find out what happened to Bijou.
Find Commander Gor'shak in Blackrock Depths.$B$BYou recall that the crudely drawn picture of the orc included bars drawn over the portrait. Perhaps you should search for a prison of some sort.
Slay Halycon, pack mistress of the Bloodaxe worg.
Venture forth to the Burning Steppes and find out what became of Sha'ni Proudtusk.
Travel to the quarry in Blackrock Mountain and slay Overmaster Pyron. Return to Thunderheart when you have completed this assignment.$B
Enter Blackrock Depths and track down Lord Incendius. Slay him and return any source of information you may find to Thunderheart.$B
Use an Evergreen Pouch with a Packet of Tharlendis Seeds and two Un'Goro Soil samples to try and cultivate samples of Morrowgrain.$B$BBring 10 Morrowgrain to Bashana Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

Take the Book of Aquor, the Silvery Claws, and the Irontree Heart to Tanaris.$B$BUse the Book of Aquor to summon Aquementas.$B$BAfter you have the completed totem, take it to J.D. Collie in Marshal's Refuge.
Collect 11 Silvery Claws and 1 Irontree Heart for Eridan Bluewind in Felwood.
Kill 11 Jadefire Felsworns, 9 Jadefire Shadowstalkers, 9 Jadefire Rogues, and Xavathras. Return to Eridan Bluewind in Felwood when the task has been completed.
Travel to Darnassus and use Eridan's Vial to collect a Vial of Blessed Water from the Temple of the Moon. Return to Eridan with the filled vial.
Speak to Eridan again in a moment.
Eridan Bluewind in Felwood wants you to kill 8 Jadefire Hellcallers, 8 Jadefire Betrayers, 8 Jadefire Tricksters, and Xavaric. Return to Eridan when the task is completed.
Find Eridan Bluewind in southern Felwood.
Take the Silver Totem of Aquementas to Linken in Marshal's Refuge.
Collect 7 Power Crystals of each color: red, blue, yellow, and green. Bring them to J.D. Collie at Marshal's Refuge.
Discover the location of the Northern Crystal Pylon in Un'Goro Crater.
Discover the location of the Eastern Crystal Pylon in Un'Goro Crater.
Discover the location of the Western Crystal Pylon.
Speak with J.D. Collie in a moment.
Hunt 5 Bloodpetal Lashers, 5 Bloodpetal Threshers, 5 Bloodpetal Flayers and 5 Bloodpetal Trappers for Larion at Marshal's Refuge.
Travel to Marvon Rivetseeker's workshop in Ratchet.
Collect 15 Bloodpetals and return to Muigin.
Take a Bloodpetal to Gregan Brewspewer in Feralas.
Recover Sha'ni's Nose-Ring from Krom'Grul and return it to Thal'trak in Kargath. Search the various caves and mines in Dreadmaul Rock.$B
Slay 15 Firegut Ogre-Mages, 7 Firegut Ogres, and 7 Firegut Ogre Brutes, and return to Oralius when you are finished.
Find Gor'tesh, somewhere to the west of Dreadmaul Rock. Kill Gor'tesh and then take Gor'tesh's Lopped Off Head back to Oralius in Burning Steppes.$B
Take Gor'tesh's Lopped Off Head and place it at the top of Dreadmaul Rock. Look for a soft dirt mound to plant the pike.
Oralius wants 50 Blackrock Medallions. Chances are high that these medallions can be found on the orcs in the Burning Steppes.

Travel to Blackrock Depths and recover 20 Dark Iron Fanny Packs. Return to Oralius when you have completed this task. You assume that the Dark Iron dwarves inside Blackrock Depths carry these 'fanny pack' contraptions.$B
Bring 2 Elixir of Fortitudes to Quentin in Thousand Needles.
Take your Fragile Sprite Darter Egg to the Hinterlands and speak to Agnar Beastamer, but hurry, you only have 1 hour to find him before the hatchling within the egg dies.
Bring a Crate of Foodstuffs and Research Equipment to Williden Marshal in Un'Goro Crater.

Use the Scraping Vial to collect a Hive Wall Sample from one of the Gorishi hive hatcheries in Un'Goro Crater.  Look for the chambers with the hanging larval spawns.$B$BBring the Hive Wall Sample to Hol'anyee Marshal in Un'Goro Crater.
Bring 8 Dinosaur Bones to Spark Nilminer in Un'Goro Crater.
Bring 8 crates of Milly's Harvest to Milly Osworth at Northshire Abbey.
Bring the Grape Manifest to Brother Neals in Northshire Abbey.
Seek out Gregan Brewspewer in northern Feralas. From him, learn how you may acquire the Videre Elixir, then return to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.
Go to the graveyard outside Gadgetzan, and use the Videre Elixir. Follow the rest of Donova's instructions to find Gaeriyan.
Follow Donova Snowden's instructions, then report back.
Donova Snowden in Winterspring wants you to kill 8 Winterfall Pathfinders, 8 Winterfall Den Watchers, and 8 Winterfall Totemics.
Search the Deadwood furbolg camp in northern Felwood for a clue.
Collect 3 Toxic Horror Droplets for Donova Snowden in Winterspring.
Find the Winterfall Runners and stop them from delivering their shipment to Winterfall Village.
Donova Snowden in Winterspring wants you to defeat High Chief Winterfall.
Take the Crudely-written Log to Kelek Skykeeper in southern Felwood.
Resurrect, then look for the gravestone that Gaeriyan told you to find.
Bring 15 Nugget Slugs to Wenikee Boltbucket in the Barrens.
Bring the Broken and Battered Samophlange to Rilli Greasygob in Orgrimmar.
Bring the Samophlange Manual to Rilli Greasygob in Orgrimmar.
Show Cyrus Therepentous the Black Dragonflight Molt you received from Kalaran Windblade.$B
Show Cyrus Therepentous proof of your worth.$B$BYou have a feeling that Cyrus already knows that you are unworthy.

Travel to Blackrock Depths and slay Bael'Gar.$B$BYou only know that the giant resides inside Blackrock Depths. Remember to use the Altered Black Dragonflight Molt on Bael'Gar's remains to capture the Fiery Essence.$B$BReturn the Encased Fiery Essence to Cyrus Therepentous.$B$B
Speak with Torwa Pathfinder in Un'Goro Crater.
Bring 4 Gromsblood, 10 Giant Silver Veins and Nagmara's Filled Vial to Mistress Nagmara in Blackrock Depths.
Confront Ulathek, then bring The Traitor's Heart to Lord Banehollow in Jaedenar.
Purchase Xorothian Stardust from Ur'dan.  Bring it to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

Escort your prisoner, Grark Lorkrub, through Burning Steppes and through Blackrock Mountain to the Searing Gorge.$B$BYou recall Lexlort mentioning that he would have his men waiting on the other side to take Grark into custody.$B$BYou will also be required to hand over your Thorium Shackles to Lexlort.
Bring 15 Blood Amber to Arathandris Silversky in Felwood.
Bring 15 Blood Amber to Maybess Riverbreeze in Felwood.
Bring the Heart of the Mountain to Maxwort Uberglint in the Burning Steppes.
Bring the Tablet Transcript to Maxwort Uberglint in the Burning Steppes.
Speak with Ragnar Thunderbrew.
Bring Ribbly's Head to Yuka Screwspigot in the Burning Steppes.
Speak with Sagorne Creststrider in the Valley of Wisdom of Orgrimmar about the Feast of Winter Veil.

Speak with Ragged John to learn of Marshal Windsor's fate and return to Marshal Maxwell when you have completed this task.$B$BYou recall Marshal Maxwell telling you to search for him in a cave to the north.
Travel to Blackrock Mountain in the northwest and enter Blackrock Depths. Find out what became of Marshal Windsor.$B$BYou recall Ragged John talking about Windsor being dragged off to a prison.
Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy War Master Voone, Highlord Omokk, and Overlord Wyrmthalak. Return to Marshal Maxwell when the job is done.
Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy General Drakkisath. Return to Marshal Maxwell when the job is done.$B
Travel to Stormwind City and venture to the city gates. Speak with Squire Rowe so that he may let Marshal Windsor know that you have arrived.
Slay Overmaster Pyron and return to Jalinda Sprig.$B$BYou recall Jalinda talking about Pyron guarding the quarry. Perhaps you should search there?
Find Lord Incendius in Blackrock Depths and destroy him!
Slay 15 Black Broodlings, 10 Black Dragonspawn, 4 Black Wyrmkin and 1 Black Drake. Return to Helendis Riverhorn when the task is complete.
Travel to Lakeshire and deliver Helendis Riverhorn's Letter to Magistrate Solomon.
Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy the source of the worg menace. As you left Helendis, he shouted a name: Halycon. It is what the orcs refer to in regards to the worg.

In the heart of Blackrock Spire you will find Mother Smolderweb. Engage her and get her to poison you. Chances are good that you will have to kill her as well. Return to Ragged John when you are poisoned so that he can 'milk' you.
Bring Doomrigger's Clasp to Mayara Brightwing in the Burning Steppes.
Bring Ridgewell's Crate to Remington Ridgewell in Stormwind.
Escort Arei to safety, then speak with Kayneth Stillwind in Forest Song, in eastern Ashenvale.
Bring 6 Filled Cursed Ooze Jars and 6 Filled Tainted Ooze Jars to Laris Geardawdle in Ironforge.
Bring 10 Filled Pure Sample Jars to Laris Geardawdle in Ironforge.$B$BIf you have trouble finding them, perhaps try to get more clues from Laris.
Find A-Me 01 in Un'Goro Crater.
Bring 2 Un'Goro Gorilla Pelts, 2 Un'Goro Stomper Pelts, and 2 Un'Goro Thunderer Pelts to Torwa Pathfinder at the entrance of Un'Goro Crater.
Find the carcass of Lar'korwi's freshest kill and steal a Piece of Threshadon Carcass before returning to Torwa Pathfinder in Un'Goro Crater.
Bring 2 Ravasaur Pheromone Glands to Torwa Pathfinder near the entrance to Un'Goro Crater.
Using the contents of Torwa's Pouch, summon Lar'korwi and defeat him. Then bring Lar'korwi's Head to Torwa Pathfinder near the entrance to Un'Goro Crater.
Bring U'cha's Pelt to Torwa Pathfinder at the entrance of Un'Goro Crater.
Stab a Devilsaur with the Devilsaur Barb. Return to Torwa Pathfinder in Un'Goro Crater when you have completed this task.
Collect 8 Bloodcap and 8 Gorishi Stings, and return to Torwa Pathfinder in Un'Goro Crater.
Retrieve a Putrid Vine from the guardian at the bottom of the Sunken Temple and return to Torwa Pathfinder.
Kill Overlord Ror and return his claw to Dreka'Sur at Bloodvenom Post in Felwood.
Find a Mithril Casing and return to A-Me 01 in Un'Goro Crater.
Escort A-Me 01 back to Karna Remtravel in Un'Goro Crater.
Bring 5 Silvermane Stalker Flanks to Agnar Beastamer in Hinterlands.
Speak to Agnar Beastamer in the Hinterlands.
Speak with Yuka Screwspigot in the Burning Steppes.
Bring Galgar 10 Cactus Apples. You remember him saying that they could be found near cactuses.
Collect a sample of corrupted water from the Jadefire Satyrs' moonwell and bring it to Winna Hazzard at Bloodvenom Post.
Take Winna's kitten to the corrupted moonwell, release it, then bring it back to Winna.$B$BOnce you have returned to Winna, click on the cat to release it to Winna.
Find Ringo at Fire Plume Ridge.
Collect 8 Webbed Diemetradon Scales and 8 Webbed Pterrordax Scales for Shizzle in Marshal's Refuge.
Lead Ringo to Spraggle Frock at Marshal's Refuge.$B$BIf Ringo faints, use Spraggle's Canteen to revive him.
Bring the Urgent Message to Cliffwatcher Longhorn at Freewind Post.
Bring Nessa's Collection to Vesprystus.

Gather Felwood Slime Samples from any of the slimes in Felwood. Then, using the Testing Equipment next to Chemist Fuely in Undercity, see which of your samples are the most corrupt. Bring 5 of the Corrupted Felwood Samples you find to Chemist Fuely.

Gather Un'Goro Slime Samples from any of the slimes in Un'Goro Crater. Then, using the Testing Equipment next to Chemist Fuely in Undercity, see which of your samples are the most pure. Bring 5 of the Pure Un'Goro Samples you find to Chemist Fuely.
Bring a Merged Ooze Sample to Chemist Fuely in Undercity.
Speak with Gornek. You recall Kaltunk marking your map with his location and mentioning that Gornek resided in the Den, a building to the west.
Speak with Nathanos Blightcaller in the Eastern Plaguelands. He is said to have taken up residence at the Marris Stead.$B
Deliver Rexxar's Letter to Myranda the Hag in the Western Plaguelands.
Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay General Drakkisath. Gather his blood and return it to Rexxar.
Collect 6 Fine Crab Chunks for Gubber Blump in Auberdine.
Catch 6 Darkshore Grouper for Gubber Blump in Auberdine.
Recover Sea Creature Bones from the beached sea creature just south of Auberdine, and then return with it to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.
Recover the Sea Turtle Remains from the Skeletal Sea Turtle in the waters west of Auberdine, and then speak with Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde back in Auberdine.
Find Bijou's Belongings and return them to her. You recall her mentioning that she stashed them on the bottom floor of the city.$B
Take Bijou's Reconnaissance Report back to Grandmaster Lexlort in Kargath.$B
Find Bijou's Belongings and return them to her. Good luck!$B
Travel to the Burning Steppes and give Bijou's Information to Marshal Maxwell.
Travel to Blackrock Spire and find Bloodaxe Worg Pups. Use the cage to carry the ferocious little beasts. Bring back a Caged Worg Pup to Kibler.
Travel to Blackrock Spire and collect 15 Spire Spider Eggs for Kibler.$B$BBy the sound of it, these eggs could be found near spiders.$B
Bring 8 Broodling Essence and the Draco-Incarcinatrix 900 to Tinkee Steamboil at the Flame Crest in the Burning Steppes.
Use the Eggscilloscope Prototype on an egg in the Rookery.
Bring 8 Collected Dragon Eggs and the Collectronic Module to Tinkee Steamboil at Flame Crest in the Burning Steppes.
Give Tinkee's Letter to Felnok Steelspring.
Bring the Frozen Eggs to Leonid Barthalomew in the Eastern Plaguelands.

Find the three gemstones of command: The Gemstone of Smolderthorn, Gemstone of Spirestone, and Gemstone of Bloodaxe. Return them, along with the Unadorned Seal of Ascension, to Vaelan.$B$BThe Generals, as told to you by Vaelan, are: War Master Voone of the Smolderthorn; Highlord Omokk of the Spirestone; and Overlord Wyrmthalak  of the Bloodaxe.

Travel to the Wyrmbog in Dustwallow Marsh. Find the ancient drake, Emberstrife and beat him without mercy until his will is broken.$B$BIt is at that moment which you must place the Unforged Seal of Ascension before the great beast. You must then be quick to use the Orb of Draconic Energy on his weakened form and claim dominion over his mental faculties. Control the beast and force the Flames of the Black Dragonflight upon the Unforged Seal of Ascension!
Protect Ranshalla while she attempts to reactivate the Altar of Elune. Report your findings to Erelas Ambersky in Rut'theran Village.
Locate Jaron Stoneshaper's wrecked camp and supplies in southern Winterspring.
Use Jaron's Pick to find the four Highborne Relic Fragments. Bring them to Aurora Skycaller in Eastern Plaguelands.

Krakle in Un'Goro Crater wants you to find the hottest area of Fire Plume Ridge.$B$BWhenever you find a hot spot, right click the thermometer to check the temperature. Keep looking until you find the hottest one.
Travel to Winterspring and speak with Donova Snowden.
Storm Shadowhoof at Everlook in Winterspring wants you to kill Ursius.
Storm Shadowhoof at Everlook in Winterspring wants you to kill Brumeran.
Storm Shadowhoof at Everlook in Winterspring wants you to defeat Shy-Rotam.
Bring Storm Shadowhoof's Marker to Melor Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff.
Find the Sacred Highborne Writings in the Temple of Zin-Malor in Azshara, and bring them to Aurora Skycaller near the Northpass Tower in Eastern Plaguelands.
Bring an Enchanted Thorium Bar, 5 Crystal Restore, and a Vial of Dire Water to Aurora Skycaller near the Northpass Tower in Eastern Plaguelands.
Take the Crystal of Zin-Malor to Lake Kel'Theril in Winterspring and find a highborne spirit that will speak to you.
Collect 2 Pristine Yeti Horns for Umi Rumplesnicker in Everlook.
Collect 10 Thick Yeti Furs for Umi Rumplesnicker in Everlook.

Take Umi's Mechanical Yeti and scare her friends with it:$B$BLegacki in Everlook (Winterspring)$BSprinkle in Gadgetzan (Tanaris)$BQuixxil in Marshal's Refuge (Un'Goro Crater)$B$BWhen you are done, bring the Mechanical Yeti back to Umi.
Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to kill 15 Raging Owlbeasts and 15 Ragged Owlbeasts.
Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to hunt 10 Berserk Owlbeasts in Winterspring.
Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to hunt 13 Moontouched Owlbeasts.
Take the Blue-feathered Necklace to Nara Wildmane.
Collect 4 Frostmaul Shards for Witch Doctor Mau'ari in Everlook.
Speak to Witch Doctor Mau'ari again in a moment to receive the lucky charm.
You must find the blue dragonflight drake champion, Scryer, and slay him. Pry his skull from his corpse and return it to Emberstrife.$B$BYou know that Scryer can be found in Winterspring.
Destroy the drake champion of the Green Flight, Somnus. Take his skull and return it to Emberstrife.
Guarding the Caverns of Time in the Tanaris Desert is Chronalis, child of Nozdormu. Destroy him and return his skull to Emberstrife.
Travel to Grim Batol and track down Axtroz, drake champion of the Red Flight. Destroy him and take his skull. Return the skull to Emberstrife.

It would appear as if the charade is over. You know that the Amulet of Draconic Subversion that Myranda the Hag created for you will not function inside Blackrock Spire. Perhaps you should find Rexxar and explain your predicament. Show him the Dull Drakefire Amulet. Hopefully he will know what to do next.
Bring 10 Highperch Wyvern Eggs to Elu in Freewind Post.
Escort Pao'ka Swiftmountain from Highperch, and then talk to Motega Firemane in Whitereach Post.
Gather 10 bushels of Incendia Agave, and then consult Magatha Grimtotem on Elder Rise in Thunderbluff.
Deliver the Everlook Report to Argent Officer Pureheart at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.
Deliver the Everlook Report to Argent Officer Garush at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.
Deliver the book, "Studies in Spirit Speaking", to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.
Bring the Fifth and Sixth Mosh'aru Tablets to Prospector Ironboot in Tanaris.
Bring the Third and Fourth Mosh'aru Tablets to Prospector Ironboot in Tanaris.
Speak with Yeh'kinya.
Speak with Molthor in Stranglethorn.
Bring 8 Uncracked Chillwind Horns to Felnok Steelspring.
Bring Felnok's Package to Tinkee Steamboil in the Burning Steppes.
Speak with Tinkee Steamboil.
Kill 12 Galak Scouts, 10 Galak Wranglers, and 6 Galak Windchasers, and then return to Cliffwatcher Longhorn in Freewind Post.
Locate and retrieve the three Secret Notes in Darkcloud Pinnacle.
Deliver Cliffwatcher Longhorn Report to Nataka Longhorn at Ghost Walker Post in Desolace.
Return the Alien Egg to Hagar Lightninghoof in Freewind Post.
Report your findings to Motega Firemane.
Bring 8 Bundles of Wood to Raelen at the Eastvale Logging Camp.
Collect 5 Shardtooth Meats and 5 Chillwind Meats for Rivern Frostwind in Winterspring.
Rivern Frostwind wants you to slay 5 Winterfall Shaman and 5 Winterfall Ursa.
Rivern Frostwind wants you to kill 4 Frostmaul Giants and 4 Frostmaul Preservers.
Bring Malyfous Darkhammer 6 Enchanted Thorium Bars, 2 Essence of Fire, and 4 Star Rubies. You will also need to turn in your Unfired Plate Gauntlets.
Protect Kanati Greycloud from the centaur attack.
Escort Lakota Windsong from the Darkcloud Pinnacle, and then talk to Thalia Amberhide at Freewind Post.
Collect 10 Doom Weed and deliver them back to Junior Apothecary Holland.$B
Collect 3 Gloom Weed and deliver them to Junior Apothecary Holland in the Brill graveyard.

Use the Temporal Displacer near one of Andorhal's silos and uncover Temporal Parasites.$B$BSlay 10 Temporal Parasites, and then return the Temporal Displacer to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.
Locate 5 Andorhal Watches, found in lockboxes amongst the rubble of the city.  Return with them to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.
Locate 5 Andorhal Watches amongst the rubble of the city, and return with them to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.
Bring the Annals of Darrowshire to Chromie in Andorhal.
Bring the Extended Annals of Darrowshire to Carlin Redpath in Eastern Plaguelands.

Place the Relic Bundle at the Darrowshire town square.$B$BPrevent Davil Lightfire's death until the death of Horgus.$B$BPrevent Captain Redpath's death until Redpath the Corrupted appears.$B$BDefeat Redpath the Corrupted.$B$BSpeak with the spirit of Joseph Redpath when he appears at the town square, then speak with Pamela at her home.
Speak with Wynd Nightchaser in Starfall Village, and ask about the proper place for the Crystal of Zin-Malor.
Destroy 8 Diseased Wolves, and then return to Mulgris Deepriver at the Writhing Haunt, Western Plaguelands.$B$B
Destroy 8 Diseased Grizzlies, and then return to Mulgris Deepriver at the Writhing Haunt, Western Plaguelands.
Based on the magic enchanted within the Glyphed Oaken Branch, its delivery to the Cenarion Circle in Darnassus is the next step the tauren druid sought.  Seek one of the druids there for assistance.

Based on the magic enchanted within the Glyphed Oaken Branch, its delivery to the Cenarion Circle in Thunder Bluff is the next step the tauren druid sought.  Seek one of the druids there for assistance.
Travel to Winterspring and find Haleh. Give her Awbee's scale.
Talk to Malyfous Darkhammer in Everlook.

The ramblings of the ghostly woman indicated that she needed a package delivered.  She claimed that it was where her horse was.  As to where the horse is or where the package was to be delivered - the ghost remains incomprehensible.

Locate the other half of the Good Luck Charm somewhere on the Felstone Farm in Western Plaguelands and reassemble it.$B$BGive the Good Luck Charm to Janice Felstone on the Felstone Farm, Western Plaguelands.
Find Jeremiah Payson in the Undercity and see if he is in fact Jeremiah Felstone.  If he is, then perhaps he'd like the package Janice Felstone made for him.
Find Ol' Emma in Stormwind and see if she is in fact Emma Felstone.  If she is, then perhaps she'd like the package Janice Felstone made for her.
Read Warosh's Scroll.  Bring Warosh's Mojo to Warosh.
Bring Araj's Phylactery Shard to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.
Speak with Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

Proceed to the Scarlet Crusade's base camp between Felstone Field and Dalson's Tears and destroy their command tent.$B$BPlace the Scourge banner at the camp, and then return to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

Using the Beacon Torch, mark each tower in Andorhal; you will need to stand in the doorway of the tower to successfully mark it.$B$BOnce all four towers are marked, return the Beacon Torch to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.
Speak with Shadow Priestess Vandis at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.
Bring Araj's Phylactery Shard to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.
Kill 10 Skeletal Flayers and 10 Slavering Ghouls in Sorrow Hill.$B$BReturn to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

Using the Beacon Torch, mark each tower in Andorhal; you will need to stand in the doorway of the tower to successfully mark it.$B$BOnce all four towers are marked, return the Beacon Torch to Commander Ashlam Valorfist in Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.
Speak with High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.
Speak with Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.
Collect 20 Minion's Scourgestones and bring them to High Priest Thel'danis in the Western Plaguelands.
Bring the voodoo feathers to Ashlam Valorfist.
Bring 10 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Hasana at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.
Bring 25 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Hasana at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.
Bring 10 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Lightspark at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.
Bring 25 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Lightspark at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.
Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm at the Cenarion Enclave of Darnassus about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.
Seek out Commander Ashlam Valorfist.  His base camp is located at Chillwind Camp, north of the Alterac Mountains.
Speak with Latronicus Moonspear at the Feathermoon Stronghold in Feralas.
Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm at the Cenarion Enclave of Darnassus about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.
Seek out Commander Ashlam Valorfist.  His base camp is located at Chillwind Camp, north of the Alterac Mountains.
Speak with Latronicus Moonspear at the Feathermoon Stronghold in Feralas.
Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.
Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glade and the Undercity.
Speak with Senani Thunderheart at Splintertree Post, Ashenvale.
Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.
Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glade and the Undercity.
Speak with Talo Thornhoof at Camp Mojache in Feralas.
Speak with Senani Thunderheart at Splintertree Post, Ashenvale.
Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.
Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glades and the Undercity.
Speak with Lorax. Listen to what he has to say.$B

Travel to Blackrock Spire and find Goraluk Anvilcrack. Slay him and then use the Blood Stained Pike upon his corpse. After his soul has been siphoned, the pike will be Soul Stained.$B$BYou must also find the Unforged Rune Covered Breastplate.$B$BReturn both the Soul Stained Pike and the Unforged Rune Covered Breastplate to Lorax in Winterspring.

Seek out and destroy 2 Entropic Beasts and 2 Entropic Horrors while exploring Shatter Scar Vale. After checking to see if the craters there are still filled with corrupt fel water, return to Taronn Redfeather in Felwood.
Enter Jaedenar and slay 4 Jaedenar Hounds, 4 Jaedenar Guardsmen, 6 Jaedenar Adepts, and 6 Jaedenar Cultists before returning to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.
Take the Empty Canteen to the Moon Well in the center of Jaedenar and fill it before returning to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.
Take the Corrupt Moon Well Water to Islen Waterseer in the Barrens.
Using the Purified Moon Well Water, douse the flames of the four braziers of protection within Shadow Hold in Felwood, then return to Greta Mosshoof in the Emerald Sanctuary.
Kill Moora and Salia, and bring Shadow Lord Fel'dan's Head to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.
Find Starfall Village in Winterspring and speak with Wynd Nightchaser.
Find Pamela's doll.
Speak with Marlene, south of the Ruins of Andorhal.
Find Carlin Redpath.
Bring Joseph's Key to Joseph's Chest.
Find Pamela Redpath.
Bring Joseph's Wedding Ring to Chromie.
Speak with Haleh if you wish to continue.
Speak with Jeziba in the Plaguelands. He resides in Andorhal.
You must retrieve the Blood of the Black Dragon Champion from General Drakkisath. Drakkisath can be found in his throne room behind the Halls of Ascension in Blackrock Spire.
Slay the beast and bring back the Hypercapacitor Gizmo and Panther Cage Key to Wizlo Bearingshiner.
Read from the Catalogue of the Wayward.$B

Escort Arko'narin to where Lightforge and her equipment are being held, and then protect her as you escape Shadow Hold. Afterwards, seek out Jessir Moonbow in Felwood to let her know what's happened to her friends.
Return to Jaedenar and kill the succubus Rakaiah before finding the Remains of Trey Lightforge.
Return the Remains of Trey Lightforge to Jessir Moonbow in Felwood.

Venture to the Scholomance and recover the Barov family fortune. Four deeds make up this fortune: The Deed to Caer Darrow; The Deed to Brill; The Deed to Tarren Mill; and The Deed to Southshore. Return to Alexi Barov when you have completed this task.
Travel to Chillwind Camp - Alliance territory - and assassinate Weldon Barov. Take his head and return to Alexi Barov.$B$BBe warned, Weldon will probably be well protected by Alliance scum.

Venture to the Scholomance and recover the Barov family fortune. Four deeds make up this fortune: The Deed to Caer Darrow; The Deed to Brill; The Deed to Tarren Mill; and The Deed to Southshore. Return to Weldon Barov when you have completed this task.
Travel to the Bulwark - Horde territory - and assassinate Alexi Barov. Take his head and return to Weldon Barov.$B$BBe warned, Alexi will probably be well protected by Horde filth.
Find Fras Siabi's smoke shop in Stratholme and recover a box of Siabi's Premium Tobacco. Return to Smokey LaRue when the job is done.$B
Smokey LaRue wants you to get 2 Thorium Bars, 1 Golden Rod, 8 Hi-Explosive Bombs, and 8 Unstable Triggers.$B$BYou will have to find a blacksmith and an engineer for these items.

Travel to Plaguewood, northwest of Light's Hope. Destroy 8 Scourge Structures by using Smokey's Special Compound at the Mark of Detonation planted inside each building. Smokey has had the Ziggurats and Slaughterhouses marked.$B$BOnce you plant the bomb, leave the building and marvel at your handiwork.$B$BBy the way, Smokey's Special Compound is rather... unstable.
Open the Argent Hold and claim your reward.
Place Dawn's Gambit in the Viewing Room of the Scholomance.  Defeat Vectus, then return to Betina Bigglezink.
Recover 10 Plagued Flesh Samples from Stratholme and return them to Betina Bigglezink. You suspect that any creature in Stratholme would have said flesh sample.
Travel to Stratholme and search the ziggurats. Find and return new Scourge Data to Betina Bigglezink.$B
Kill 20 Plagued Hatchlings, then return to Betina Bigglezink at the Light's Hope Chapel.

Travel to Stratholme, in the north. Search the supply crates that litter the city and recover 5 Stratholme Holy Water. Return to Leonid Barthalomew the Revered when you have collected enough of the blessed fluid.
Travel to Stratholme and find Menethil's Gift. Place the Keepsake of Remembrance upon the unholy ground.
Return to Magistrate Marduke in Caer Darrow. Show him the Soulbound Keepsake.
Bring the Frozen Eggs to Betina Bigglezink.
Find Egan. You only know that he was last seen around Stratholme.
Bring Zaeldarr's Head to Caretaker Alen at Light's Hope Chapel.
Travel to Stratholme and find Archivist Galford of the Scarlet Crusade. Destroy him and burn down the Scarlet Archive.
Venture to Stratholme and destroy Baron Rivendare. Take his head and return to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff.$B
Speak with Lord Maxwell Tyrosus. He is inside the church.

Go to Felstone Field in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there.  It may have a key that will allow access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Felstone Field Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

Go to Dalson's Tears in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Dalson's Tears Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

Go to the Writhing Haunt in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Writhing Haunt Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

Go to Gahrron's Withering in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Gahrron's Withering Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

Go to Felstone Field in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there.  It may have a key that will allow access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Felstone Field Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

Go to Dalson's Tears in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Dalson's Tears Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

Go to the Writhing Haunt in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Writhing Haunt Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

Go to Gahrron's Withering in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Gahrron's Withering Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.
Bring 15 Skeletal Fragments to Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.
Bring the Imbued Skeletal Fragments and 15 gold coins to Krinkle Goodsteel in Gadgetzan.
Destroy Araj the Summoner and bring Araj's Scarab to Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.
Bring 15 Skeletal Fragments to Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.
Bring the Imbued Skeletal Fragments and 15 gold coins to Krinkle Goodsteel in Gadgetzan.
Destroy Araj the Summoner and bring Araj's Scarab to Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.
Bring Davil's Libram and Redpath's Shield to Carlin Redpath.
Bring the Skull of Horgus and the Shattered Sword of Marduk to Carlin Redpath at Light's Hope Chapel.
Bring 5 Resonating Skulls and the Mystic Crystal to Carlin Redpath in Eastern Plaguelands.
Free 15 Darrowshire Spirits and return to Carlin Redpath.
Take the Bundle of Relics to Chromie in Andorhal.
Speak with Jaron Stoneshaper in Starfall Village.
Deliver the Crystal of Zin-Malor to Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

Use Egan's Blaster on the ghostly and spectral citizens of Stratholme. When the restless souls break free from their ghostly shells, use the blaster again - freedom will be theirs!$B$BFree 15 Restless Souls and return to Egan.
To become a Weaponsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Ironus: 4 Moonsteel Broadswords, 4 Massive Iron Axes, 2 Heavy Mithril Axes, and 2 Big Black Maces.$B
To become an armorsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Okothos: 4 Ornate Mithril Helms, 2 Ornate Mithril Boots, 1 Ornate Mithril Breastplate.
To become a Weaponsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Borgosh: 4 Moonsteel Broadswords, 4 Massive Iron Axes, 2 Heavy Mithril Axes, and 2 Big Black Maces.$B
Travel to Stratholme and kill the Crimson Hammersmith. Recover the Crimson Hammersmith's Apron and return to Lilith.$B
Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay Shadow Hunter Vosh'gajin. Recover Vosh'gajin's Snakestone and return to Kilram.
Find the Black Guard Swordsmith in Stratholme and destroy him. Recover the Insignia of the Black Guard and return to Seril Scourgebane.
Find Doctor Theolen Krastinov inside the Scholomance. Destroy him, then burn the Remains of Eva Sarkhoff and the Remains of Lucien Sarkhoff. Return to Eva Sarkhoff when the task is complete.$B

Return to the Scholomance with the Blood of Innocents. Find the porch and place the Blood of Innocents in the brazier. Kirtonos will come to feast upon your soul.$B$BFight valiantly, do not give an inch! Destroy Kirtonos and return to Eva Sarkhoff.$B
Locate Jandice Barov in the Scholomance and destroy her. From her corpse recover Krastinov's Bag of Horrors. Return the bag to Eva Sarkhoff.
Escort Kerlonian Evershade to Liladris Moonriver at Maestra's Post in Ashenvale.
Talk to Jinar'Zillen at Shadowprey Village, and then bring Nataka Longhorn 2 Bloodbelly fish.
Travel to the Arathi Highlands, to the ruins of Stromgarde. Search Stromgarde for a Keepsake of Remembrance. If you find such an item, return with it to Magistrate Marduke.
Travel to Light's Hope in Eastern Plaguelands and seek out Leonid Barthalomew the Revered. Show him the Keepsake of Remembrance and tell him all that you have discovered.

Find Ras Frostwhisper in the Scholomance. When you have found him, use the Soulbound Keepsake on his undead visage. Should you succeed in reverting him to a mortal, strike him down and recover the Human Head of Ras Frostwhisper. Take the head back to Magistrate Marduke.
Use the Foreman's Blackjack on Lazy Peons when they're sleeping.  Wake up 5 peons, then return the Foreman's Blackjack to Foreman Thazz'ril in the Valley of Trials.
Bring Thazz'ril's Pick to Foreman Thazz'ril.
Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.
Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.
Seek out Ogtinc in Azshara.
Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.
Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.
Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.
Return the Exorcism Censer to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.
Seek out Ogtinc in Azshara.
Speak to Ur'kyo in Orgrimmar.
Bring 10 Kodo Bones from the Kodo Graveyard to Bibbly F'utzbuckle at Kormek's Hut.
Bring 10 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.
Bring 25 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.
For 30 Insignias of the Dawn and 30 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.$B
For 110 Insignias of the Dawn and 110 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.
For 20 Insignias of the Dawn and 20 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.
For 75 Insignias of the Dawn and 75 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.
For 45 Insignias of the Dawn and 45 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.
For 7 Insignias of the Dawn and 7 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.$B
For 6 Insignias of the Dawn and 6 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.
For 27 Insignias of the Dawn and 27 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.
Destroy 6 Highborne Apparitions and 6 Highborne Lichlings before returning to Loh'atu in Azshara.
Kill 6 Haldarr Satyr, 2 Haldarr Tricksters, 2 Haldarr Felsworn and then return to Loh'atu on the border of Ashenvale.
Grazle wants you to prove yourself by killing 6 Deadwood Warriors, 6 Deadwood Pathfinders, and 6 Deadwood Gardeners.  Return to him in southern Felwood near the Emerald Sanctuary when you are done.
Travel north along the main road in Felwood and speak with the furbolg named Nafien.  He stands guard outside the entrance to Timbermaw Hold.

Some of the Deadwood furbolgs wear a distinctive headdress that may be used as a means of proof in thinning their numbers. Bring me a feather from any headdresses you acquire; for every set of five you bring me, you will earn recognition amongst the Timbermaw.

Plant the Demon Summoning Torch in the mouth of High Chief Winterfall's cave in the Winterfall furbolg village.  Defeat the demon and retrieve the Essence of Xandivious for Gorn One Eye in Timbermaw Hold.
Bring the Timbermaw Offering of Peace to King Magni Bronzebeard in Ironforge.
Bring the Timbermaw Offering of Peace to Thrall in Orgrimmar.
Salfa wants you to kill 8 Winterfall Shaman, 8 Winterfall Den Watchers, and 8 Winterfall Ursa.  Salfa is located just outside the entrance to Timbermaw Hold in Winterspring.

The Winterfall are known to carry spirit beads to ward against foul spirits. These beads have clearly failed in their purpose, as the Winterfall themselves are the agents of corruption. Bring to me these spirit beads from fallen Winterfall furbolgs; for every set of five you bring me, you will earn recognition amongst the Timbermaw.
Bring 30 Runecloth to Meilosh in Timbermaw Hold.
Bring 2 Mooncloth to Meilosh in Timbermaw Hold.
Bring five Tamed Kodos and the Kodo Kombobulator back to Smeed Scrabblescrew at Scrabblescrew's Camp.
Kill 2 Scarlet Medics, 2 Scarlet Hunters, 2 Scarlet Magi and 2 Scarlet Knights before returning to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.
Kill Huntsman Radley and Cavalier Durgen before returning to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.
Enter Hearthglen and find a high vantage point from which you can see the town and gauge the Scarlet Crusade's forces, then return to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.
Use the Empty Termite Jar on the Termite Mounds in Eastern Plaguelands. After you've gathered 100 Plagueland Termites, return to Mickey Levine at the Bulwark in Tirisfal Glades.
Find someplace suitable in the center of the Northridge Lumber Mill in Western Plaguelands to place the Barrel of Plagueland Termites.
Use the Empty Termite Jar on the Termite Mounds in Eastern Plaguelands. After you've gathered 100 Plagueland Termites, return to Nathaniel Dumah at Chillwind Camp in Western Plaguelands.
Find someplace suitable in the center of the Northridge Lumber Mill in Western Plaguelands to place the Barrel of Plagueland Termites.
Retrieve the Demon Box from Thunder Axe Fortress, and return it, along with the Demon Pick to Taiga Wisemane in Shadowprey Village.$B
Banish 6 Portals at Mannoroc Coven and return to Taiga Wisemane at Shadowprey Village.
Escort the Gizelton Caravan past the Kolkar Centaur village. Talk with Smeed at Scrabblescrew's Camp for your reward.
Escort the Gizelton Caravan through Mannoroc Coven. Talk with Smeed at Scrabblescrew's Camp for your reward.
Find Pamela Redpath in Darrowshire.
Protect Sentinel Aynasha, then speak with Onaeya at Maestra's Post in Ashenvale.

Fill the Coated Cerulean Vial at the orange crystal pool in Maraudon.$B$BUse the Filled Cerulean Vial on the Vylestem Vines to force the corrupted Noxxious Scion to emerge.$B$BHeal 8 plants by killing these Noxxious Scion, then return to Talendria in Nijel's Point.
Find Donova Snowden near the hot springs in Winterspring.
Speak with Jaron Stoneshaper at Starfall Village.
Speak with Winna Hazzard in Felwood.
Speak with Witch Doctor Mau'ari in Everlook.
Andi Lynn in Gadgetzan wants you to destroy the Dunemaul Compound by killing 10 Dunemaul Brutes, 10 Dunemaul Enforcers, and Gor'marok the Ravager.

Find the Half Pendant of Aquatic Agility and the Half Pendant of Aquatic Endurance.  Speak with the residents of Moonglade to learn clues as to where these items may be located.$B$BForm the Pendant of the Sea Lion from the two pendant halves.  You need to be in proximity of the Shrine of Remulos to do this.$B$BBring the joined pendant to Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

Find the Half Pendant of Aquatic Agility and the Half Pendant of Aquatic Endurance.  Speak with the residents of Moonglade to learn clues as to where these items may be located.$B$BForm the Pendant of the Sea Lion from the two pendant halves.  You need to be in proximity of the Shrine of Remulos to do this.$B$BBring the joined pendant to Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.
Speak with Layo Starstrike near the Valor's Rest graveyard of Silithus, showing him Rabine's Letter.

Find the Felvine in Dire Maul and acquire a shard from it.  Chances are you'll only be able to procure one with the demise of Alzzin the Wildshaper.  Use the Reliquary of Purity to securely seal the shard inside, and return it to Rabine Saturna in Nighthaven, Moonglade.
Travel to Silithus and search for a Reliquary of Purity within the ruins of Southwind Village.  If you are able to find it, return with it to Rabine Saturna in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

Find a Shrine Bauble in Lake Elune'ara, and take it to the Shrine of Remulos in northwestern Moonglade.  Once there, use the Shrine Bauble.$B$BYou must speak with Tajarri at the shrine afterwards in order to complete the trial.

Find a Shrine Bauble in Lake Elune'ara, and take it to the Shrine of Remulos in northwestern Moonglade.  Once there, use the Shrine Bauble.$B$BYou must speak with Tajarri at the shrine afterwards in order to complete the trial.
Return to Thunder Bluff and show Turak Runetotem the Pendant of the Sea Lion.
Return to Darnassus and show Mathrengyl Bearwalker the Pendant of the Sea Lion.
Seek out the Great Bear Spirit in northwestern Moonglade and learn what it has to share with you about the nature of the bear.  When finished, return to Dendrite Starblaze in Nighthaven, Moonglade.
Seek out the Great Bear Spirit in northwestern Moonglade and learn what it has to share with you about the nature of the bear.  When finished, return to Dendrite Starblaze in Nighthaven, Moonglade.
Return to Darnassus and speak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave.
Return to Thunder Bluff and speak with Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise.

Use the Empty Cliffspring Falls Sampler to draw a sample of water from the mouth of the cave by the falls.$B$BDeliver the Filled Cliffspring Falls Sampler to Alanndarian Nightsong in Auberdine, Darkshore.
Return to Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave, Darnassus.
Use the Empty Dreadmist Peak Sampler to draw a sample of water from a pool at the top of the peak.$B$BDeliver the Filled Dreadmist Peak Sampler to Tonga Runetotem at the Crossroads, Barrens.
Return to Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise, Thunder Bluff.
Narain Soothfancy wants you to find his ex-best friend forever (BFF), Stewvul, and take back the scrying goggles that Stewvul stole from him.
Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris wants you to speak with Dirge Quikcleave in Gadgetzan.
Find Narain Soothfancy's book, buried on an island in the South Seas.
Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris wants you to travel to Winterspring and place the Bag of Gold at the drop off point documented by the booknappers.
Recover the 8 lost chapters of Draconic for Dummies and combine them with the Magical Book Binding and return the completed book of Draconic for Dummies: Volume II to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.
Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris wants you to bring him 20 Arcanite Bars, 10 Elementium Ore, 10 Azerothian Diamonds, and 10 Blue Sapphires.
Use the Arcanite Buoy at the Swirling Maelstrom at the Bay of Storms in Azshara.
Do a train emote at Kali Remik, and in exchange you'll receive a Darkspear Gumdrop!
Collect the Warsong Supplies: Warsong Saw Blades, Logging Rope, Warsong Oil, and the Warsong Axe Shipment for Locke Okarr in Splintertree Post.
Report to Kadrak at the watch tower in northern Barrens.

Fill the Coated Cerulean Vial at the orange crystal pool in Maraudon.$B$BUse the Filled Cerulean Vial on the Vylestem Vines to force the corrupted Noxxious Scion to emerge.$B$BHeal 8 plants by killing these Noxxious Scion, then return to Vark Battlescar in Shadowprey Village.
Wait for Keeper Remulos at the Moonglade to cleanse the Nightmare Engulfed Object.
Travel to the four Emerald Dream portals in Azeroth and collect a Fragment of the Nightmare's Corruption from each. Return to Keeper Remulos in the Moonglade when you have completed this task.$B
Defend Nighthaven from Eranikus. Do not let Keeper Remulos perish. Do not slay Eranikus. Defend yourself. Await Tyrande.$B
Take the Green Scepter Shard to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris.$B
Search Ragefire Chasm for Maur Grimtotem's corpse and search it for any items of interest.
Search Orgrimmar for Ragefire Chasm, then kill 8 Ragefire Troggs and 8 Ragefire Shaman before returning to Rahauro in Thunder Bluff.
Take the Grimtotem Satchel to Rahauro in Thunder Bluff.
Escort Kaya Flathoof to Camp Aparaje, and then return to Makaba Flathoof near the southeastern edge of Stonetalon.$B
Tell Tammra Windfield in Sun Rock Retreat the good news.$B
Kill 8 Grimtotem Ruffians and 6 Grimtotem Mercenaries, and then return to Makaba Flathoof near the southeastern edge of Stonetalon.$B
Kill Grundig Darkcloud and 6 Grimtotem Brutes, and return to Makaba Flathoof near the southeastern edge of Stonetalon.$B
Maggran wishes you to deliver a letter to Grish Longrunner at the Great Lift in the Barrens.
Maggran Earthbinder in Sun Rock Retreat wants you to slay 7 Bloodfury Harpies, 7 Bloodfury Ambushers, 7 Bloodfury Slayers and 7 Bloodfury Roguefeathers.
Maggran at Sun Rock Retreat wishes you to slay Bloodfury Ripper and bring her remains as proof of your deed.
Explore deep into the cave at Boulderslide Ravine and bring back 10 Resonite Crystals for Mor'rogal at Sun Rock Retreat to investigate.
Open the Resonite cask with the Enchanted Resonite Crystal, and then slay Goggeroc. Return to Mor'rogal with the news and Enchanted Resonite Crystal.
Bring 10 Incendrites to Tsunaman at Sun Rock Retreat.
Speak to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.
Get the Sceptre of Light and then return it to Azore Aldamort at the tower in Ethel Rethor.$B
Get the Book of the Ancients and return it to Azore Aldamort at the tower in Ethel Rethor.$B
Tammra Windfield at Sun Rock Retreat wants you to gather 10 Gaea Seeds.
Plant 10 Gaea Seeds in Gaea Dirt Mounds, and then return the remaining Enchanted Gaea Seeds to Tammra at Sun Rock Retreat.

Speak to Myranda to gain the Scarlet Illusion. Travel to Hearthglen while under the Scarlet Illusion and deliver Tirion's Gift to Highlord Taelan Fordring.$B$BHearthglen is to the north, Taelan should be inside of Mardenholde Keep.
Travel to Blackrock Spire and collect 20 Black Dragonspawn Eyes. Return to Myranda the Hag when the task is complete.
Travel to the Wyrmbog in Dustwallow Marsh and seek out Emberstrife's Den. Once inside, wear the Amulet of Draconic Subversion and speak with Emberstrife.$B
Bring Roon's Kodo Horn to Hemet Nesingwary in Stranglethorn.

Travel to Corin's Crossing to the east and slaughter the Scourge that inhabit the town. Collect 7 pieces of Living Rot in under 10 minutes. Use the Mortar and Pestle to grind the Living Rot into Coagulated Rot.
Slay 20 Noxious Plaguebats and 10 Monstrous Plaguebats. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller when you are finished.

Travel to the northern borders of the Eastern Plaguelands and recover the Quel'Thalas Registry. The item is somewhere in the Quel'Lithien lodge.$B$BYou must also slay 8 Rangers, 8 Pathstriders, and 8 Woodsmen.
Find Duskwing and slay him. From the corpse, recover a Patch of Duskwing's Fur and return it to Nathanos Blightcaller.$B$BIt is said that Duskwing roams the countryside to the north of Marris Stead.
Find Borelgore in the northern wastes of Eastern Plaguelands and destroy him. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller when the mission is complete.
Travel to the Undercity and speak with Varimathras.

Travel to Tyr's Hand, southeast of the Marris Stead. Once there, take a bite of the Rotten Apple. While under the guise of the Scarlet Crusade, deliver the Grand Crusader's Command to Crusader Lord Valdelmar.

The Scarlet Crusade is on the move. Somewhere along the road from Tyr's Hand to Stratholme you will find the Oracle, Demetria, and her entourage. Hunt her down and slay her. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller should you succeed.
Travel to Stratholme and slay Ramstein the Gorger. Take his head as a souvenir for Nathanos.
Return to Nathanos Blightcaller with the new information.$B

Travel to Stratholme, in the northern part of the Plaguelands. It is in the Scarlet Bastion that you will find the painting 'Of Love and Family,' hidden behind another painting depicting the twin moons of our world.$B$BReturn the painting to Tirion Fordring.
Speak with Rabine Saturna in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.
Find 10 pieces of Soft-shelled Clam Meat and bring it back to Mai'Lahii at Shadowprey Village.
Speak with Torwa Pathfinder in Un'Goro Crater.
Bring 10 Irondeep Supplies to the Alliance Quartermaster in Dun Baldar.
Bring 10 Coldtooth Supplies to the Alliance Quartermaster in Dun Baldar.
Bring 10 Coldtooth Supplies to the Horde Quatermaster in Frostwolf Keep.
Bring 10 Irondeep Supplies to the Horde Quartermaster in Frostwolf Keep.
Seek out Remulos in Moonglade and give him the Seed of Life.
Escort Melizza Brimbuzzle, then speak with Hornizz Brimbuzzle at the Kodo Graveyard in Desolace.
Speak with Brother Anton in Desolace.
Slay 7 Slitherblade Myrmidon, 7 Slitherblade Naga, and 5 Slitherblade Sorceresses, and then talk to Drulzegar at Shadowprey in Desolace.
Bring Augustus' Receipt Book to Augustus the Touched in Terrordale.
Scour the Eastern Plaguelands for clues as to the "Blightcaller" and the missing SI:7 agents. If you find any SI:7 Insignias, return them to Flint Shadowmore at Chillwind Camp.
Return to Stormwind and inform Highlord Bolvar Fordragon of the fate of Nathanos Marris.
Follow Reginald Windsor through Stormwind. Protect him from harm!

Keep Muglash safe as he travels to the brazier. Help him by putting the brazier out, then protect him as you fight against the Naga.$B$BIf you are successful, return to the Zoram'gar Outpost and inform the Warsong Runner of the death of Vorsha the Lasher.
Find the 12 missing pages of the Shredder Operating Manual, and put them together to form Chapters 1, 2, and 3. Return the pages to Gurda Ragescar near Splintertree Post.$B
Bring 20 Wrathtail Heads to Marukai along the Zoram Strand.
Bring 8 Troll Charms to Mitsuwa at the Zoram'gar Outpost.
Collect 16 Satyr Horns for Pixel in Splintertree Post.
Bring 20 Sapphires of Aku'Mai to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.
Kill Lorgus Jett in Blackfathom Deeps and then return to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.
Bring the Fathom Core to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.

Dispatch 12 Befouled Water Elementals at Mystral Lake, due east of the Talondeep Path and southwest of Splintertree Post.$B$BScout the gazebo on Mystral Lake that overlooks the nearby Alliance outpost.$B$BReturn to Mastok Wrilehiss at Splintertree Post, Ashenvale.
Bring the Befouled Water Globe to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.
Take a Scalding Mornbrew to Durnan Furcutter inside Anvilmar before it gets cold in five minutes!
Take down 8 Thistlefur Avengers and 8 Thistlefur Shaman; most are located east of Zoram Strand in Thistlefur Village.  Once completed, return to Karang Amakkar at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.
Place Karang's Banner on the Foulweald Totem Mound.  Do not let the furbolgs destroy the banner.  Defeat Chief Murgut and bring Murgut's Totem to Karang Amakkar at Zoram'gar.
Speak with Mor'zul Bloodbringer in the Burning Steppes.
Xen'zilla at Malaka'Jin needs you to kill 10 Deepmoss Creepers and 7 Deepmoss Venomspitters.
Escort Ruul, then speak with Yama Snowhoof in Splintertree Post.
Escort Torek on his attack against Silverwing Outpost and Duriel Moonfire, then report to Ertog Ragetusk at Splintertree Post.
Kill 8 Razorfen Battleguard, 8 Razorfen Thornweavers, and 8 Death's Head Cultists and return to Myriam Moonsinger near the entrance to Razorfen Downs.
Kill 9 Ashenvale Outrunners, then return to Kuray'bin at Splintertree Outpost.

Nat Pagle wants you to catch the following fish:$B$BMisty Reed Mahi Mahi from the Misty Reed Strand in the Swamp of Sorrows.$B$BA Sar'theris Striker from the Sar'theris Strand in Desolace.$B$BFeralas Ahi from the Verdantis River of Feralas.$B$BSavage Coast Blue Sailfin from the Savage Coast of Stranglethorn Vale.$B$BReturn to Nat Pagle when you have reeled them all in!

Save patients by using Triage Bandages to tend to their wounds. You must save 15 patients before 6 of them die from their injuries.$B$BRemember the order of triage! Critically Injured Soldiers die the fastest followed by Badly Injured Soldiers. Injured Soldiers take the longest to die and should be saved AFTER your Critically Injured and Badly Injured Soldiers have been triaged.

Save patients by using Triage Bandages to tend to their wounds. You must save 15 patients before 6 of them die from their injuries.$B$BRemember the order of triage! Critically Injured Soldiers die the fastest followed by Badly Injured Soldiers. Injured Soldiers take the longest to die and should be saved AFTER your Critically Injured and Badly Injured Soldiers have been triaged.
Capture 5 Deeprun Rats by using the Rat Catcher's Flute. Lead the rats back to Monty. Don't forget to turn in the flute when you're finished.
Take the Carton of Mystery Meat to Nipsy at the Stormwind Deeprun Tram Depot.
Slay Nefarian and recover the Red Scepter Shard. Return the Red Scepter Shard to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris. You have 5 hours to complete this task.
Recover Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye from the Winterax caves and return it to Master Ryson.$B$BBe warned, it is said that Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye carries with it a terrible curse!
Recover Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye from the Winterax caves and return it to Master Ryson.$B$BBe warned, it is said that Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye carries with it a terrible curse!
Find out what became of Wing Commander Guse, Wing Commander Jeztor, and Wing Commander Mulverick. Return to Commander Mulfort should you complete your mission.
Travel into Stormpike territory and slay Commander Karl Philips. Return to Commander Louis Philips when the task is complete.$B
Bring 20 Armor Scraps to Smith Regzar in Frostwolf Village.
Free the spirits of 8 Tortured Druids and 8 Tortured Sentinels in Southwind Village, and then return to Layo Starstrike at the Valor's Rest graveyard of Silithus.

Scale the tower of Southwind Village and locate a means to stir the silithid hive into activity.  Bring back anything unusual you may uncover when doing so to Layo Starstrike at the Valor's Rest graveyard of Silithus.
Take the Encrusted Silithid Object to Umber - the Cenarion Circle's archivist - in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.
null
Bring 20 Armor Scraps to Murgot Deepforge in Dun Baldar.
Use the Aspect of Neptulon on poisoned elementals of Eastern Plaguelands.  Bring 12 Discordant Bracers and the Aspect of Neptulon to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.
Kill 15 Dust Stormers and 15 Desert Rumblers and then return to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.
Bring the Eye of the Emberseer to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.
Kill 1 Fire Lord, 1 Molten Giant, 1 Ancient Core Hound and 1 Lava Surger, then return to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.
Earn an Honored faction with the Hydraxian Waterlords, then talk to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.
Bring the Hands of Lucifron, Sulfuron, Gehennas and Shazzrah to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.
Claim your reward from Hydraxis' Coffer.
Speak with Lord Jorach Ravenholdt in Ravenholdt Manor.
Travel to Frostwolf territory and search for Wing Commander Slidore, Wing Commander Vipore, and Wing Commander Ichman. Return to Commander Duffy should you complete your mission.
Travel into Frostwolf territory and slay Commander Louis Philips. Return to Commander Karl Philips when the task is complete.$B

Feel free to read the book, "The Feast of Winter Veil", to learn more about the holiday.  When you are finished with the book, deliver it to Cairne Bloodhoof in Thunder Bluff.
If you are interested in helping Sagorne Crestrider in Orgrimmar's Valley of Wisdom, bring him an Azerothian Diamond and a Pristine Black Diamond.

Use the Divination Scryer in the heart of the Great Ossuary's basement in the Scholomance.  Doing so will bring forth spirits you must fight.  Defeating these spirits will summon forth Death Knight Darkreaver; defeat him.$B$BBring Darkreaver's Head to Sagorne Creststrider in the Valley of Wisdom, Orgrimmar.
Collect a sample of air, fire, earth and water for Bath'rah the Windwatcher.
Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.
Locate the Smokywood Pastures investigator that has gone missing in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.
Speak with Great-father Winter in Orgrimmar.

Find Metzen the Reindeer.  Use the notes provided to you for clues as to where he is being held.$B$BWhen you find Metzen, have the Pouch of Reindeer Dust in your possession so you can sprinkle some of the dust on him; this should free Metzen from his bonds of captivity.$B$BReturn the Pouch of Reindeer Dust to Kaymard Copperpinch in Orgrimmar once Metzen is freed.
Bring 1 Deeprock Salt and 5 gold coins to the Holly Preserver machine, upon which you will receive 5 Preserved Holly.
Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Ironforge.
Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Ironforge.
Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.
Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.
Locate the Smokywood Pastures investigator that has gone missing in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.
Speak with Greatfather Winter in Ironforge.

Find Metzen the Reindeer.  Use the notes provided to you for clues as to where he is being held.$B$BWhen you find Metzen, have the Pouch of Reindeer Dust in your possession so you can sprinkle some of the dust on him; this should free Metzen from his bonds of captivity.$B$BReturn the Pouch of Reindeer Dust to Wulmort Jinglepocket in Ironforge once Metzen is freed.

Bring 5 Gingerbread Cookies and an Ice Cold Milk to Greatfather Winter in Ironforge.
Bring 5 Gingerbread Cookies and an Ice Cold Milk to Great-father Winter in Orgrimmar.
